comment: SERIOUSLY????18k and yet sd 665 processor. This is where it failed.
665 chipset and 13mp camera in the price of 18000/- trying to make us fool, not more than 8000₹ phone, check the price of vivoz1 pro

Snapdragon 655 has higher performance rating than Snapdragon 720g in verse.com reviews. Don't know what reviews and versions people are talking about...5000mah battery, 8GB ram, quad cam with wide angle and macro, for this price , this is pretty neat phone.
Fully satisfied with the product, smooth functioning and lookwise very smart.The most beautiful thing is sensor on the back side.

Amazon should give option to give less than 1 star.This phone is coming with very old processor Snapdragon 665. It is better to go with Samsung exynos  or Xiaomi 8 pro or 9 pro.So please please buyers don't waste your money on this useless phone.
Very good camera quality, display is a very big and colour is very beautiful
